name: Fiskher AS
description: Fishbuddy revolutionizes recreational fishing with a knowledge-based approach, combining expert advice from top anglers in each country, AI/AR technology, and satellite data. Offering tailored fishing spots and real-time insights for key species, Fishbuddy also supports marine conservation by working with authorities like the Coast Guard, empowering users to fish smarter while protecting marine ecosystems.
one_liner: Fishbuddy revolutionizes recreational fishing with a knowledge-based approach, combining expert advice from top anglers in each country, AI/AR technology, and satellite data. Offering tailored fishing spots and real-time insights for key species, Fishbuddy also supports marine conservation by working with authorities like the Coast Guard, empowering users to fish smarter while protecting marine ecosystems.
